text:
Hana-chan, thank you.
I managed to buy some cheap and cute socks.

...But buying socks for the school uniform
feels nostalgic.

Hehe,
it's not like it was that long ago, right?

Ah.
Um... Can we stop by the bookstore?
I feel like I'm always dragging you along with me...

No, it's okay.
I wanted to go too.

I want,
to study idols by reading magazines...

Hana-chan, that...
I was thinking of doing the same thing!
